# BRUV Deployment Metadata Template

## Deployment Information
**Deployment ID**: <!-- Unique identifier for this deployment -->
**Site Name**: <!-- Name or description of deployment site -->
**Date**: <!-- YYYY-MM-DD format -->
**Start Time**: <!-- HH:MM:SS local time -->
**End Time**: <!-- HH:MM:SS local time -->
**Duration**: <!-- Total deployment duration in minutes -->

## Location
**Latitude**: <!-- Decimal degrees (e.g., -33.8568) -->
**Longitude**: <!-- Decimal degrees (e.g., 151.2153) -->
**GPS Accuracy**: <!-- AUTO-POPULATED: From GPS metadata or estimated -->
**Depth**: <!-- AUTO-POPULATED: From pressure sensor or depth estimation -->
**Distance to Shore**: <!-- AUTO-POPULATED: Calculated from coastline databases -->
**Marine Protected Area**: <!-- Yes/No, if yes specify name -->

## Environmental Conditions
**Water Temperature**: <!-- Degrees Celsius -->
**Visibility**: <!-- Excellent/Good/Fair/Poor or meters -->
**Current Strength**: <!-- Strong/Moderate/Weak/None -->
**Current Direction**: <!-- N/NE/E/SE/S/SW/W/NW -->
**Wave Height**: <!-- Meters or Calm/Choppy/Rough -->
**Weather**: <!-- Sunny/Cloudy/Overcast/Rainy/Stormy -->
**Tide State**: <!-- High/Rising/Low/Falling -->

## Substrate and Habitat
**Primary Substrate**: <!-- sand/coral_reef/rock/seagrass/kelp/rubble/artificial/mixed -->
**Secondary Substrate**: <!-- If mixed habitat -->
**Habitat Complexity**: <!-- Low/Medium/High -->
**Coral Cover**: <!-- 0-100% if applicable -->
**Algae Cover**: <!-- 0-100% if applicable -->
**Structural Features**: <!-- Drop-off/Reef wall/Plateau/Sand channel/etc. -->

## Equipment Details
**BRUV Model**: <!-- Underwater camera system used -->
**Camera Model**: <!-- GoPro Hero X, etc. -->
**Camera Settings**:
  - **Resolution**: <!-- 4K/1080p/etc. -->
  - **Frame Rate**: <!-- fps -->
  - **Field of View**: <!-- Wide/Linear/etc. -->
**Bait Type**: <!-- Pilchards/Tuna/etc. -->
**Bait Amount**: <!-- Weight in grams -->
**Deployment Method**: <!-- Boat drop/Diver placement/etc. -->

## Research Context
**Study**: <!-- Name of research project -->
**Principal Investigator**: <!-- Lead researcher name -->
**Institution**: <!-- Research organization -->
**Permit Numbers**: <!-- Research permits if applicable -->
**Objectives**: <!-- Brief description of study goals -->

## Data Processing
